seo.title: FluxGrowth Studio Landing Page √¢‚Ç¨‚Äú Project
seo.description: Details about the landing page and visual identity created for FluxGrowth Studio.

hero.title: Landing Page & Visual Identity - FluxGrowth Studio
hero.summary: Project developed with a focus on digital positioning, strategic design, and visual performance.

sections.title: Project Overview
paragraphs: FluxGrowth Studio is a digital agency focused on driving growth for brands and businesses. The goal was to build a modern, responsive, and impactful landing page aligned with a bold visual identity that communicates technology, confidence, and creative energy.
Design decisions were made to express the essence of the brand √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù innovation, performance, and real results √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù using Figma for prototyping and React for the entire web experience.
The strategic narrative targeted mid- to high-tier clients, presenting the agency√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s services with clarity, flow, and visual appeal to amplify recognition and conversion potential.

items.title: 1. Research & Strategy
bullets: Defined brand personality and analysed direct competitors.
Built a moodboard with references in contemporary tech design.
Mapped the user journey for a fluid and intuitive navigation.

items.title: 2. Visual Identity
bullets: Created the logo in Illustrator with minimalist forms and geometric type.
Developed a sophisticated dark palette (black, purple, and grey).
Produced mockups and visual variations for social and presentation assets.

items.title: 3. Landing Page Design
bullets: Prototyped the interface in Figma using UI/UX principles.
Structured visual hierarchy prioritising headlines, CTAs, and credibility sections.
Designed subtle animations and transitions to convey dynamism.

items.title: 4. React Development
bullets: Implemented the entire solution in React with modular, reusable architecture.
Delivered advanced responsiveness optimised for desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Configured light/dark theming with dynamic switching.
Integrated smooth animations and interactions powered by CSS and React libraries.

sections.title: Results Achieved
items: Solid visual identity aligned with the brand√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s strategic positioning.
Highly responsive, interactive landing page focused on performance.
Stronger conversion potential and credibility with the target audience.
Scalable technical foundation ready for future evolutions and integrations.

seo.title: Landing Page & Visual Identity ‚Äî Nutri Clara Mendes
seo.description: Modern, responsive landing page optimized for conversion, designed to strengthen nutritionist Clara Mendes' digital presence with a light, professional, wellness-first look.

hero.title: ü•ó Nutri Clara Mendes ‚Äî Professional Wellness Landing Page
hero.summary: Modern, responsive, conversion-oriented landing page designed to reinforce Clara Mendes' digital presence with a light, professional, well-being centered aesthetic.

sections.title: ‚úÖ Project Overview
paragraphs: Nutri Clara Mendes' landing page was designed to elevate her digital presence while communicating trust, credibility, and warmth ‚Äî essentials in the nutrition field.
The main focus was to build a clean, modern, and empathetic look that reflects health, balance, and a conscious lifestyle, presenting her services with clarity and accessible language.
The project blends an organic visual identity, responsive design, strategic content, and technical SEO to ensure performance and relevance across search engines.

items.title: 1. Research & Strategic Direction
bullets: Analysed references in nutrition, health, and wellness.
Created a moodboard with light palettes, natural aesthetics, and soft elements.
Mapped the user journey with a focus on conversion and trust.

items.title: 2. Visual Identity
bullets: Developed the visual concept with organic tones mixing whites, greens, and nudes.
Selected typography that reinforces lightness and professionalism.
Produced mockups and visual elements used throughout the page.
Edited and treated imagery to maintain aesthetic coherence.

items.title: 3. Interface Design
bullets: Delivered a full Figma prototype with clear hierarchy and reading flow.
Structured sections for hero, services, differentiators, about, and scheduling.
Highlighted trustworthy CTAs to streamline conversions.
Applied subtle micro-interactions aligned with UX principles.

items.title: 4. React Development
bullets: Implemented with React + Vite + Tailwind CSS for optimised performance.
Built clean, reusable componentization.
Ensured fluid responsiveness for desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Applied technical SEO: open graph, meta tags, semantic structure, sitemap.
Integrated Analytics plus conversion events.
Shipped an optimised Netlify deployment.

sections.title: ‚úÖ Outcomes
items: Consistent visual identity focused on credibility within the health segment.
Highly responsive landing page, fast and SEO-ready.
Higher conversion potential with easier contact via WhatsApp.
Solid foundation for future evolutions such as blog, patient area, or personal brand.

seo.title: LexPrime Advocacia ‚Äì Full-Service Law Landing Page
seo.description: Premium institutional landing page for a full-service law firm focused on credibility, performance, and clear communication.

hero.title: LexPrime Advocacia ‚Äî Full-Service Law Landing Page
hero.summary: Elegant, responsive, high-performance experience blending dark tones, golden accents, and strong typography to translate the authority of LexPrime.

sections.title: Project Overview
paragraphs: LexPrime Advocacia is a full-service law firm that needed a digital presence aligned with its modern, high-standard positioning.
The assignment was to craft an institutional landing page that communicates credibility, transparency, and legal sophistication while keeping the language clear and objective.
The architecture was built with React + Vite + Tailwind, combined with refined technical SEO, Google Analytics 4, and end-to-end performance optimisations.
Every touchpoint prioritises fluid navigation on desktop and mobile, highlighting practices, team, and differentiators with CTAs connected to WhatsApp.

sections.title: Experience Highlights
items: Sections with smooth animations and wave transitions representing movement and evolution.
Hero section with institutional video that reinforces presence and visual authority.
Dedicated spaces for team, practice areas, differentiators, and a form integrated with WhatsApp.
Modular, scalable components ready for future expansions such as blog and client areas.

items.title: 1. Strategy & Architecture
bullets: Mapped the user journey and defined the content hierarchy.
Planned technical SEO with optimised heading structure (H1‚ÄìH3).
Designed conversion flows connecting forms, buttons, and WhatsApp.

items.title: 2. Visual Design
bullets: Crafted a premium identity with dark palette, golden details, and elegant contrasts.
Selected legal-inspired typography and exclusive vector icons to express authority.
Produced responsive variations and complementary assets for social media.

items.title: 3. Development & Performance
bullets: Implemented the full experience with React, Vite, and Tailwind using modular components.
Applied media lazy loading, asset optimisation, and compression for maximum speed.
Integrated Google Analytics 4 with custom navigation and conversion events.
Deployed on Netlify with Brotli compression and social meta tags (Open Graph & Twitter Cards).

sections.title: Outcomes
items: Higher on-page engagement and noticeable reduction in loading time.
Memorable visual experience reinforcing LexPrime as a reference in Business and Civil Law.
Scalable technical foundation prepared for future integrations such as blog and client areas.

gallery.title: Project Gallery
gallery.desktopAlt: Desktop screen {{index}} of the LexPrime Advocacia project
gallery.mobileAlt: Mobile screen {{index}} of the LexPrime Advocacia project

seo.description: Immersive landing page built to translate the spirit of the Ritus de Luz brand.

hero.title: Ritus de Luz Landing Page - Immersive Brand Experience
hero.summary: Landing page created to express the energy of Ritus de Luz with fluid storytelling, light interactions, and a conversion-focused journey.

sections.title: Objective
paragraphs: Create a digital experience that reinforces the premium positioning of Ritus de Luz, translating modern spirituality into an engaging and intuitive journey. The landing page guides visitors from discovery to action in just a few clicks while preserving a sensorial narrative.

sections.title: Design Highlights
items: Immersive hero with expanded typography and conversion-focused CTA.
Soft gradients, luminous particles, and organic icons evoking the aura of light.
Narrative sections with crescendo rhythm, presenting purpose, services, and testimonials.
Color system balancing nocturnal depth and golden light to reinforce the spiritual concept.

items.title: 1. Initial Connection
items.description: Hero section with a direct message, brand manifesto, and CTA leading to a personalised consultation.

items.title: 2. Guided Journey
items.description: Purpose, pillars, and benefits presented with micro-interactions on scroll to keep visitors immersed.

items.title: 3. Social Proof
items.description: Testimonials and sensorial badges that reinforce trust and the differentiators of the Ritus method.

items.title: 4. Conversion
items.description: Optimised form and final CTA with simplified navigation for quick contact.

sections.title: Result
items: Narrative experience that translates the brand essence throughout the layout.
Optimised performance with Flutter Web development and fast loading on multiple devices.
Consistent sensorial identity aligned with the renewed communication of Ritus de Luz.
Higher engagement rates thanks to the combination of motion design and emotional storytelling.

sections.text: ‚ú¶ Ritus de Luz is where art meets technology - a digital space where every detail reflects soul, balance, and purpose.

seo.title: Ritus de Luz Website √¢‚Ç¨‚Äú Project
seo.description: Website crafted with emotional design, sensorial branding, and an immersive digital journey.

hero.title: Ritus de Luz Website - Brand Storytelling in Motion
hero.summary: Website created to unite emotional design, sensorial branding, and immersive storytelling for the Ritus de Luz universe.

sections.title: Project Overview
paragraphs: The Ritus de Luz website was envisioned as a sensorial journey that honours modern spirituality. The objective was to create a premium digital presence that balances visual poetry, motion, and clarity.

Every section translates the brand√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s pillars: purpose, rituals, and transformation. Visual compositions explore luminescent gradients, organic shapes, and ethereal textures to reinforce the narrative.
Development was carried out in Flutter Web to guarantee performance, responsiveness, and expressive animations across every device.

items.title: 1. Research & Concept
bullets: Immersion in brand storytelling, rituals, and spiritual archetypes.
Mapping of sensorial references √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù light, motion, and the sacred.
Definition of a narrative path that moves from purpose to transformation.

items.title: 2. Visual Identity
bullets: Palette featuring deep blues, iridescent purples, and golden light.
Typography combining extended serif titles with fluent sans-serif paragraphs.
Iconography inspired by sacred geometry and organic light patterns.

items.title: 3. Website Design
bullets: High-fidelity prototyping in Figma applying principles of emotional UX.
Narrative sections presenting purpose, services, and the brand journey with fluid rhythm.
Micro-interactions and transition effects to create a feeling of light, harmony, and movement.

items.title: 4. Flutter Web Development
bullets: Full implementation in Flutter ensuring total responsiveness and optimised performance.
Application of subtle animations, parallax, and fade effects for immersive storytelling.
Modular, scalable structure prepared for future integrations and digital expansions.

sections.title: Results Achieved
items: Immersive, high-performance website translating the idea of modern spirituality.
Refined visual identity with an elegant, symbolic digital presence.
Emotional and intuitive experience connecting visitors to the project√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s essence.
Robust technological foundation ready to evolve with new features and integrations.

sections.text: ‚ú¶ Ritus de Luz is where art and technology meet - a digital sanctuary where every detail radiates soul, balance, and purpose.

seo.title: ZenBodhi App √¢‚Ç¨‚Äú Project
seo.description: Mobile app for guided meditation, mindfulness, and self-development inspired by Zen Buddhism.

hero.title: ZenBodhi App - Mindfulness & Awakening
hero.summary: Mobile experience crafted to guide meditation, mindfulness, and self-development inspired by Zen philosophy.

sections.title: Project Overview
paragraphs: ZenBodhi invites users to dive into mindfulness journeys that merge ancestral practices with contemporary technology. The design embraces serenity through soft colours, ethereal icons, and calm transitions.
Every screen was designed to transmit peace from the very first touch, encouraging presence and inner balance.

items.title: 1. Research & Concept
bullets: Explored visual and symbolic references from Zen and Buddhism.
Defined the core purpose of the app: awakening the present moment.
Built a conceptual moodboard in Figma inspired by nature, temples, and breathing patterns.

items.title: 2. Experience Design
bullets: Created screens and interactive prototypes in Figma with gentle typography and generous spacing.
Developed bespoke icons and illustrations that reinforce the contemplative feeling.
Composed backgrounds and textures inspired by sumi-e ink and organic forms.

items.title: 3. Mobile Development
bullets: Implemented in React Native to ensure fluid performance on iOS and Android.
Integrated Firebase for authentication, user journeys, and personalised tracks.
Prepared a modular structure for future additions such as guided audio, presence journal, and mindful reminders.

sections.title: Expected Results
items: Immersive usage focused on inner peace and daily mindfulness practice.
Minimalist, harmonious design that invites pause and full attention.
Scalable foundation set to evolve with new tracks, wellbeing metrics, and wearable integrations.

sections.text: ‚ú¶ ZenBodhi is where silence gains shape and awakening becomes a daily habit.
